title: Book a Room for a Study Group
description: A student group wants to book a classroom for a study session next week.

tasks.description: Identify the student and their club/group affiliation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student is part of a registered student organization.

tasks.description: Check the availability of small classrooms for the requested date and time.
Reserve the selected classroom for the student group.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the room and sends a confirmation.
